title: Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 9 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park Astronomy Evening Programs      Time: 9:00 PM to 11:00 PM Location: South Rim Campground Amphitheater  Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Everyday  from 07/24/2016 to 09/30/2016 Join Sky Rangers and astronomers from the Black Canyon Astronomical Society.  Rangers will present an illustrated program in the South Rim Campground Amphitheater followed by Night Sky Observation by telescope. (weather permitting)  View Details      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park Campground Evening Program       Time: 9:00 PM to 10:00 PM Location: South Rim Campground Amphitheater Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Everyday  from 07/24/2016 to 09/30/2016 Learn more about the park with a ranger-led illustrated program on a wide variety of topics. Specific topics are posted at the South Rim Visitor Center and South Rim Campground. Times will be earlier in late summer.  View Details      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park Chasm View Ranger Talk       Time: 11:00 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Chasm View Overlook Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Everyday  from 07/24/2016 to 09/30/2016 Join a park ranger to explore more of the Black Canyon, from plants and animals to geology. Specific program topics posted at the South Rim Visitor Center.  View Details      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park East Portal Walk       Time: 10:30 AM to 12:00 PM Location: East Portal Ranger Station Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Program runs Monday -Thursday beginning August 8th. Examine the fascinating cultural and natural history of the East Portal area on this guided walk. Note: Road to East Portal is a 16% grade.  View Details      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park Geology Walk      Time: 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: South Rim Visitor Center, Rim Rock Trail Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Everyday  from 07/24/2016 to 09/30/2016 Meet a ranger at the visitor by 10am for this 1 hour hike on the Rim Rock Trail to learn more about the fascinating geology of the Black Canyon.  View Details      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park Pulpit Rock Geology Talk       Time: 2:00 PM to 2:30 PM Location: Chasm View Overlook Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Everyday  from 05/27/2016 to 09/05/2016 Want to learn park geology quick? Meet a Ranger at Pulpit Rock Overlook to get the rundown on how Black Canyon formed.  View Details      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park Wilderness Walk       Time: 2:30 PM to 4:30 PM Location: Meet at the South Rim Visitor Center Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Wednesday, August 10, 2016 Everyday  from 07/25/2016 to 09/05/2016 Explore the Oak Flat Trail on the edge of the Black Canyon Wilderness! Rangers will examine the many aspects that make the wilderness wild. Bring water and wear sturdy hiking shoes.  View Details      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park Early Evening Program      Time: 7:00 PM to 7:45 AM Location: South Rim Campground Amphitheater  Fees: Park Entrance Fee     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly  from 07/25/2016 to 09/05/2016 Join a ranger for an earlier evening program to discuss park wildlife.  View Details      Black Canyon Of The Gunnison National Park Founders Day Celebration      Location: Montrose Pavilion, Montrose, CO Fees: FREE     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Celebrate 100 years of the National Park Service! Music, special guests, volunteer recognition and more!  View Details
